StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Imperial weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Refined weapons of Imperial craftsmanship, featuring elegant designs that blend practical functionality with imperial sophistication and quality materials.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Colovian weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Practical weapons of the Colovian highlands, built for durability and effectiveness with straightforward designs reflecting their martial culture and military traditions.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Nibenese weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Sophisticated weapons of the Nibenese, featuring elegant craftsmanship and magical enhancements that reflect their cosmopolitan culture and arcane traditions.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Imperial Legion weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Standardized weapons of the Imperial Legion, featuring disciplined military designs with red and gold details, organized manufacturing, and symbols of Imperial authority.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Breton weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Knightly weapons of the scholarly Bretons, combining practical combat effectiveness with academic precision and blue and silver decorative elements.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Nord weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Robust weapons of the fierce Nords, built for harsh conditions and powerful strikes with grey and blue Nordic patterns and practical craftsmanship.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Redguard weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Curved weapons of the desert-dwelling Redguards, featuring distinctive scimitar designs with brown and bronze colors adapted for quick, precise combat.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Crown weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Ornate ceremonial weapons of the Crown nobility, featuring traditional Yokudan designs with elaborate decorations symbolizing ancient royal heritage.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Forebear weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Practical weapons of the Forebear party, combining traditional Redguard craftsmanship with foreign influences and trade-focused utility.

StyleItemCategoryDef.label: Ansei weapons
StyleItemCategoryDef.description: Mystical weapons of the Ansei sword-singers, featuring minimalist designs that emphasize spiritual focus and the perfect balance required for blade mastery.
